segment.source: Instructions about how to clear all of the sites from your global Enterprise Mode site list.
segment.target: Instructions about how to clear all of the sites from your global Enterprise Mode site list.

segment.source: Remove all sites from your Enterprise Mode site list using the Enterprise Mode Site List Manager (Internet Explorer 11 for IT Pros)
segment.target: Remove all sites from your Enterprise Mode site list using the Enterprise Mode Site List Manager (Internet Explorer 11 for IT Pros)

segment.source: Remove all sites from your Enterprise Mode site list using the Enterprise Mode Site List Manager
segment.target: Remove all sites from your Enterprise Mode site list using the Enterprise Mode Site List Manager

segment.source: Applies to:
segment.target: Applies to:

segment.source: Windows 10
segment.target: Windows 10

segment.source: Windows 8.1
segment.target: Windows 8.1

segment.source: Windows 7
segment.target: Windows 7

segment.source: Windows Server 2012 R2
segment.target: Windows Server 2012 R2

segment.source: Windows Server 2008 R2 with Service Pack 1 (SP1)
segment.target: Windows Server 2008 R2 with Service Pack 1 (SP1)

segment.source: You can clear all of the sites from your global Enterprise Mode site list.
segment.target: You can clear all of the sites from your global Enterprise Mode site list.

segment.source: Important
segment.target: Important

segment.source: This is a permanent removal and erases everything.
segment.target: This is a permanent removal and erases everything.

segment.source: However, if you determine it was a mistake, and you saved an XML copy of your list, you can add the file again by following the steps in the Add multiple sites to the Enterprise Mode site list using a file and Enterprise Mode Site List Manager (schema v.2) or Add multiple sites to the Enterprise Mode site list using a file and the Enterprise Mode Site List Manager (schema v.1), depending on your operating system.
segment.target: However, if you determine it was a mistake, and you saved an XML copy of your list, you can add the file again by following the steps in the Add multiple sites to the Enterprise Mode site list using a file and Enterprise Mode Site List Manager (schema v.2) or Add multiple sites to the Enterprise Mode site list using a file and the Enterprise Mode Site List Manager (schema v.1), depending on your operating system.

segment.source: To clear your compatibility list
segment.target: To clear your compatibility list

segment.source: On the File menu of the Enterprise Mode Site List Manager, click Clear list.
segment.target: On the File menu of the Enterprise Mode Site List Manager, click Clear list.

segment.source: Click Yes in the warning message.
segment.target: Click Yes in the warning message.

segment.source: Your sites are all cleared from your list.
segment.target: Your sites are all cleared from your list.

segment.source: Related topics
segment.target: Related topics

segment.source: Download the Enterprise Mode Site List Manager (schema v.2)
segment.target: Download the Enterprise Mode Site List Manager (schema v.2)

segment.source: Download the Enterprise Mode Site List Manager (schema v.1)
segment.target: Download the Enterprise Mode Site List Manager (schema v.1)

segment.source: Use the Enterprise Mode Site List Manager
segment.target: Use the Enterprise Mode Site List Manager
